marklogic.body: Hey shapton and jess where are the protest and outrage over this crime? Oh I forgot 2 black men killed a Hispanic in Cold blood and shot the rest of the family including a child. Bunch of feral beast and need to be put down as such, not housed,fed and free medical for life Off the taxpayer dime. But that's nothing new to them anyway. Now I will sit back and wait on all the Bleeding hearts to call me names like bigot/racist cuz they have no way to debate the truth , so they will resort to name calling and whatnot.Â
